name: Face_Dazzle_Anti_Biometric
description: Constant IR halo around head prevents facial recognition systems from detecting/enrolling face
expected_result: Facial recognition confidence drops below 30% threshold. System returns 'Unknown' or 'No Face Detected'.
limitations: Requires hood or hat with LEDs positioned at face level. Ineffective on thermal cameras. Distance critical - must be within 1.5m of camera. Rotating head reduces effectiveness.
